title: Start of a new FP series (Part II added)
content:
**[THIS](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214744/http:/www.fontplay.com/images2/brushpenmktrio.jpg)** is the first in series that takes the two-headed doll to the next step. I have several different three panel strips made from doll photos I’ve taken. (dialogue suggestions gladly accepted)

Font is Brushpen MK by Manfred Klein

**[PART II](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214744/http:/www.fontplay.com/images2/paquitatrio.jpg)**

Font is Paquita by Juanjez Nikis - Thought ballon is from Blambot.com

The first balloon contains a line I saw needle-pointed  
on a pillow at an antique store this afternoon.

 [‹ ITC Franklin Gothic: Oblique vs. Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214744/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19453 "Go to previous forum topic") [Looking for alternatives for "The Riverdale Review" nameplate blackletter ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214744/http:/www.typophile.com/node/19429 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fontplayer

comments.content:
Maybe [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20071222214744/http:/www.bizarrerecords.com/galleries/marcy/marcySingstc.html) will give you some ideas…

Make sure to listen to the song.

peace
